title: ‘For All Mankind’ star Jodi Balfour joins another Apple TV+ original with ‘Ted Lasso’ S3 role
content:
For All Mankind star Jodi Balfour joins the cast of Apple TV+ hit Ted Lasso for Season 3. This is a recurring role in which she will play Jack, a likable venture capitalist.

more…

description: For All Mankind star Jodi Balfour joins the cast of Apple TV+ hit Ted Lasso for Season 3. This will be a recurring role.
